Author: my50ththrowaway
Text: i feel the same but for kind of the opposite reason. two of my best friends have EDs, one is in recovery and one is not. i can’t talk to my recovered friend because she will try to get me to recover (not force it, but tell me that i should try) and i can’t talk to my non-recovered friend because that just triggers my ED even more. it’s a rough spot to be in.
